title: Turbogeth keeps crashing after a network interruption
body:
One of my nodes running TG had its internet connection interrupted for a few hours. During that time TG was unable to sync and eventually crashed. Now I can no longer start the TG instance and I guess I might need to resync :( any suggestions?
